```{r}
#| label: setup

library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_light())
```


```{r}
data("population")
```


```{r}
filter(population, country %in% c("China", "India", "Great Britain", "United States of America")) %>% 
  ggplot() + geom_line(aes(year, population, group = country, color = country)) + 
    scale_y_log10(labels = scales::number_format(scale = 1e-6, suffix = "M"))
```
